com.filesActions

Class ReadExternalFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filesActions.ReadExternalFiles

  • public class ReadExternalFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    ReadExternalFiles class contains all functions needed tp extract informations from files to run the application
    This class contains 1 public function and 5 private functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    C.DEBAISIEUX

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayAreaCode
      arrayAreaCode ArrayList type collection used to keep the areaCode extracted from external file this Array is used for checking available AreaCode of France country
      @see areaCode @see checkUpAvailableAreaCode
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayMail
      arrayMail ArrayList type collection used to keep the mail extracted from external file this Array is used for checking available email endings
      @see mailEndings @see checkUpAvailableEmail
      private static java.io.BufferedReader buffer 
      private static java.io.File file
      file, fileR and buffer are File related objects put in private static to be used only by all the functions of this class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void areaCode()
      This function extract area codes from csv file and add it to ArrayList<String> arrayAreaCode
      The first line for the csv file is ignored by the extraction function Only the third columns (the one which contains the area code) is extracted from the CSV file If a problem occur it is shoulder by the catch part The function ends with the finally block in which the buffer is closed
      The following URL needs to be parametized before jar compilation for the extraction to be working file = new File("C:/Users/final/Desktop/externalFiles/areaCode.csv")
      static void dispatchInfoFromFiles(javax.swing.JList patientList, javax.swing.JList examinationList, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom)
      The only public function of this class lunched in starting application and dispaitching informations from files if files exist
      @see FileControler @see readPatientFile @see readExaminationFile @see readRoomFile() @see RoomFunction#creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty @see areaCode @see mailEndings
      private static void mailEndings()
      This function extract mail endings from csv file and add it to ArrayList<String> arrayMail
      The first line for the csv file is ignored by the extraction function If a problem occur it is shoulder by the catch part The function ends with the finally block in which the buffer is closed
      The following URL needs to be parametized before jar compilation for the extraction to be working file = new File("C:/Users/final/Desktop/externalFiles/mailTerminaisons.csv")
      private static void readExaminationFile(javax.swing.JList examinationList, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient)
      This function extract Examen from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Examen>arrayExamination
      Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitExamination and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed The patient for whom the examination has been registerd is extracted from arrayPatient thoses variables are used in Examen constructor.
      private static void readPatientFile(javax.swing.JList patientList, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient)
      This function extract Patients from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Patient>arrayPatient
      Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitPatient and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed before being used in Patient constructor.
      private static void readRoomFile(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList)
      This function extract Chambre from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Chambre>arrayRoom or RoomFunction.bookedRoomList
      Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitRoom and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed The examination for which a room has been booked is extracted from arrayExamination those variables are used in Chambre constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • dispatchInfoFromFiles

        public static void dispatchInfoFromFiles(javax.swing.JList patientList,
                                         javax.swing.JList examinationList,
                                         javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom,
                                         javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom)
        The only public function of this class lunched in starting application and dispaitching informations from files if files exist
        • @see FileControler
        • @see readPatientFile
        • @see readExaminationFile
        • @see readRoomFile()
        • @see RoomFunction#creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty
        • @see areaCode
        • @see mailEndings
        Parameters:
        patientList - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the patient objects existing in arrayPatient
        examinationList - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        switchRoomAndExaminationList - : Graphic list componant switching display informations between Examen objects and Chambre object
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        arrayPatient - : used to keep the Patient object extracted from external file or created by the user
        arrayRoom - : used to keep the Chambre object extracted from external file
        listOfBookedRoom - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object extracted from external file or booked by the user

      • mailEndings

        private static void mailEndings()
        This function extract mail endings from csv file and add it to ArrayList<String> arrayMail
        The first line for the csv file is ignored by the extraction function If a problem occur it is shoulder by the catch part The function ends with the finally block in which the buffer is closed
        The following URL needs to be parametized before jar compilation for the extraction to be working file = new File("C:/Users/final/Desktop/externalFiles/mailTerminaisons.csv")

      • areaCode

        private static void areaCode()
        This function extract area codes from csv file and add it to ArrayList<String> arrayAreaCode
        The first line for the csv file is ignored by the extraction function Only the third columns (the one which contains the area code) is extracted from the CSV file If a problem occur it is shoulder by the catch part The function ends with the finally block in which the buffer is closed
        The following URL needs to be parametized before jar compilation for the extraction to be working file = new File("C:/Users/final/Desktop/externalFiles/areaCode.csv")

      • readPatientFile

        private static void readPatientFile(javax.swing.JList patientList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient)
        This function extract Patients from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Patient>arrayPatient
        Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitPatient and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed before being used in Patient constructor. Reach created Patient are stored in arrayPatient and displayed in patientList.
        patient.save = false is only used in writing and reading Object and allow the application to switch beetween toString options this param doesn't have Getter and Setter functions to reduce all wrong using
        Parameters:
        patientList - : Graphic list componant showing the patient objects existing in arrayPatient
        arrayPatient - : used to keep the Patient object extracted from external file or created by the user
        See Also:
        ParseFunctions#numericConversion(), ParseFunctions#numericConversionLong(), Patient.Patient(int, boolean, boolean, String, String, String, int, String, String, long, String, String, String, boolean)

      • readExaminationFile

        private static void readExaminationFile(javax.swing.JList examinationList,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient)
        This function extract Examen from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Examen>arrayExamination
        Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitExamination and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed The patient for whom the examination has been registerd is extracted from arrayPatient thoses variables are used in Examen constructor. Reach created Examen are stored in arrayExamination and displayed in examinationList.
        examination.save = false is only used in writing and reading Object and allow the application to switch beetween toString options this param doesn't have Getter and Setter functions to reduce all wrong using
        Parameters:
        examinationList - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        arrayPatient - : used to keep the Patient object extracted from external file or created by the user
        See Also:
        ParseFunctions.numericConversion(java.lang.String), PatientFunction@extractPatientFromArray, Examen.Examen(Patient, Chambre, String, String)

      • readRoomFile

        private static void readRoomFile(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                 javax.swing.JList listOfBookedRoom,
                                 javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList)
        This function extract Chambre from csv file and add it to ArrayList<Chambre>arrayRoom or RoomFunction.bookedRoomList
        Each rows are extracted from the file, stocked in a String [] splitRoom and split Then each index of the array are stored in variables and parsed if needed The examination for which a room has been booked is extracted from arrayExamination those variables are used in Chambre constructor. each created Chambre are stored in arrayRoom and/or RoomFunction.bookedRoomList, it depends of the existing Examen or not. This information is known thank to the length of the array [] splitRoom which determined the process followed for the instanciation of Chambre Object Then those informations are displayed in examinationList
        room.save = false is only used in writing and reading Object and allow the application to switch beetween toString options this param doesn't have Getter and Setter functions to reduce all wrong using
        Parameters:
        arrayRoom - : used to keep the Chambre object extracted from external file
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        listOfBookedRoom - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object extracted from external file or booked by the user
        switchRoomAndExaminationList - : Graphic list componant switching display informations between Examen objects and Chambre object *
        See Also:
        ParseFunctions.numericConversion(java.lang.String), ExaminationFunction.extractExaminationFromArray(java.util.ArrayList<com.objectsPackage.Examen>, int), Chambre.Chambre(String, String, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, boolean, Examen), Chambre.Chambre(String, String, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, boolean)
